Projects & Tasks The projects & tasks screen shows your projects and tasks. Tap on projects to expand or hide their lists of tasks. Tap on a task to edit it. Long-press on a project to delete it.
Add Task New Project Project created Error creating project Delete Project Are you sure you want to delete the project \'%s\' and all of its tasks? Project deleted Error while deleting project
Task Creator The task creator is where you can create or edit tasks by filling out various fields. Only the name field is mandatory.
Project: Title: Start Date: Priority: Start Time: End Time: Duration: minutes Repeat Task: Tap to set... Details Complete on %s Task created Error while creating task Task updated Error while updating task Delete Task Are you sure you want to delete this task? Task deleted Failed to delete task
Settings and More Here you can change the application\'s settings, view your usage statistics and manage your Giickos Plus subscription and teams.
Settings Notifications Send Feedback About us Change Account Log Out Delete Account Log In Giickos Plus: Not logged in Log Out Are you sure you want to log out from your account? Timer & Detox Here you can set a timer to track the amount of time spent working on a task. You may also configure it to work as a pomodoro timer, and enable various \'detox\' options to reduce distractions from your phone. Detox Pomodoro Select a task
Calendar The calendar shows you the tasks you have planned for each day. You may tap a task to view it and edit it, or tap an empty space to create a new task on the chosen date and time.
All apps locked No notification Only emergency calls Let your phone down No Projects You must create a project to add tasks. Select \"New Project\" in the Task Explorer to get started.
Bamboo garden
Plant a bamboo with a growth time, goals, steps, obstacles, benefits and a letter for the future you. Once the bamboo is planted, you can view the info by tapping on it, but you can\'t see the letter. The letter is only visible when the bamboo is fully grown and harvested to the storage. In order to make it grow, you can water it once a day. Watering represents you have achieved your goals for the day.
Garden Storage Objectives, new habits, remove bad habits. (No more than 3 tasks; they must be measurable) Steps to achieve your objectives? (Be specific) Obstacles that you will face and how will you react? Benefits of achieving your objectives? Letter for the future you:
You haven\'t collected any bamboo yet
